cedar.processing.steps.PythonScript.name: Python Script von lasrs
cedar.processing.steps.PythonScript.code:
import numpy as np
import pycedar as pc

#Print to messages tab:
# pc.messagePrint('text')
# pc.messagePrint(str(...))

#Inputs: (NumPy Arrays)
# pc.inputs[0]
# pc.inputs[1]
# ...

#Outputs:
# pc.outputs[0]
# pc.outputs[1]
# ...


input = pc.inputs[0]

pc.outputs[0] = input * 2
